page.title: 14OUR EDUCATION & SCHOOL
page.content: Our school has been involved in this project for a long time and it has taken a lot of our class lesson time. Next term most of us are going to Secondary school. It is a strange year this year because not only our year is going up, but the 3rd. year are going up too. This is because of something called 'reorganisation'. It all sounds quite daft to me & I don't see why they couldn't leave things alone. We are called a Middle school now but next year it will be a Junior school. I think I am glad that I am leaving now as I prefer to be in a Middle school as it sounds more grown up. There a lot of teachers leaving this year...even Mr.Masfield who organised all this. There are 310 children in our shool now.In the secondary school there will be 601 which is a lot more.
